TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyGridEditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart
Public NotInheritable Class PropertyGridEditorPart Inherits EditorPart

summary.span: 提供編輯器控制項，可讓使用者編輯關聯的 或伺服器控制項上的自訂屬性。

span.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit custom properties on an associated or server control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 提供一般的使用者介面 (UI)，可讓使用者在編輯自訂內容伺服器控制項放在區域。The provides a generic user interface (UI) that enables users to edit custom properties on and server controls placed in zones. 相較之下，其他控制項，例如和控制項、 編輯現有的僅、 UI 導向屬性從類別。In contrast, the other controls, such as the and controls, edit only existing, UI-oriented properties from the class. 就像 Web 組件控制項集合中有工具導向的區域 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀) 有工具導向組件的控制項，其中每一項都必須位於工具區域的對應型別。Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls, and each of these must reside in a corresponding type of tool zone. 這些類型的 Web 組件控制項集合中的控制項有兩個特殊的特性：These kind of controls in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - 是讓終端使用者個人化 Web 組件的應用程式中形成主頁面的 UI 控制項的協助程式控制項。They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize the controls that form the primary UI of a page in a Web Parts application. - 它們只會中顯示特定網頁顯示模式。They are visible only in certain page display modes. 控制項是特殊的控制項，並只有在網頁上處於編輯模式，且時特定變成可見或編輯伺服器控制項選取的使用者。The control is a special control, and it becomes visible only when a Web page is in edit mode, and when a specific or server control has been selected by a user for editing. 控制項，如同所有其他控制項都必須位於頁面上的區域。The control, like all other controls, must reside in an zone on the page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 只能包含區域控制項和控制項不能放在任何其他類型的區域。An zone can contain only controls, and controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone. 控制項的標記與原始程式碼中的屬性提供編輯的 UI`WebBrowsable`屬性 (從類別)。The control provides an editing UI for properties that are marked in the source code with the `WebBrowsable` attribute (from the class). 當這個屬性，以標記的屬性建立根據屬性的類型的編輯 UI 控制項，並使用物件，如果需要將每個編輯控制項中的值轉換成屬性的型別。When a property is marked with this attribute, a control creates the editing UI based on the type of the property, and uses a object if needed to convert the value in each editing control to the type of the property. 您也可以加入其他屬性可幫助来顯示的編輯 UI 控制項。You can also add other attributes that help the control to display the editing UI. `WebDisplayName`屬性 (從類別) 可讓您指定與每個控制項的編輯 UI 中出現的標籤的文字。The `WebDisplayName` attribute (from the class) allows you to specify the text for the label that appears with each control in the editing UI. `WebDescription`屬性 (從類別) 可讓您指定為編輯的 UI 中的每個控制項的工具提示顯示的字串。The `WebDescription` attribute (from the class) allows you to specify a string that appears as a ToolTip for each control in the editing UI. 下表中所編輯的各種類型的屬性建立的控制項。The controls created to edit properties of various types are listed in the following table. |屬性類型Property type|若要編輯的屬性建立控制項Control created to edit the property| |-------------------|------------------------------------------| |StringString|| |Int、 Float、 單位Int, Float, Unit|| |BooleanBoolean|| || （包含列舉值的清單） (contains the list of enumerated values)| ||| 類別具有屬性，用來取得或設定控制項的可見的標題文字。The class has a property, which is used to get or set the visible title text for the control. 沒有也受保護屬性，決定頁面進入編輯模式時，是否顯示控制項。There is also a protected property, which determines whether the control is displayed when the page enters edit mode. 類別也有兩個重要的方法，和，它繼承自類別並覆寫。The class also has two important methods, and , which it inherits from the class and overrides. 方法非常重要，因為它們可讓取得和設定的編輯器控制項的欄位值和屬性之間的屬性值上控制所編輯。The methods are critical because they enable getting and setting the property values between the field values of the editor control and the properties on the control being edited. 因為控制項可讓您編輯自訂的屬性，您需要其他中若要編輯的外觀、 配置和行為設定的 Web 組件控制項的控制項控制項。Because the control allows you to edit only custom properties, you will need the other controls in the Web Parts control set to edit the appearance, layout, and behavior of controls. 其他控制項包含、 ，而控制項。The other controls include the , the , and the controls. 這些控制項應該提供編輯所需的大部分編輯功能控制項，但如果有必要，您也可以建立自訂編輯器控制項繼承自類別。These controls should provide most editing features required to edit controls, but if necessary, you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the class. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a code example, see the class overview topic. > [!NOTE] > 若要改善存取範圍，內呈現控制項`
`項目。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`項目群組的一組相關的使用中進行編輯的控制項控制項，以及它協助視覺化使用者代理程式 （例如一般的網頁瀏覽器） 和語音導向使用者代理程式 （在這些控制項之間的索引標籤式瀏覽例如，螢幕讀取軟體）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項呈現標記可能不符合協助工具標準，例如網頁內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告控制在網頁上，並讓它編輯有幾項 UI 屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declare a control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a control. 程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 網頁包含控制項和控制項，以及自訂的參考控制項。A Web page that contains an control and a control, along with a reference to a custom control. - 包含自訂的類別控制項。A class that contains the custom control. - 當您載入瀏覽器中的，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 使用者控制項的原始程式碼來自另一個主題。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 對於程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要取得的使用者控制項的.ascx 檔案[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主題，並放置在.aspx 頁面，在此程式碼範例中的相同資料夾中的檔案。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含的宣告式參考控制項和子系``包含的宣告式參考的項目控制項。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains a declarative reference to a control. 頁面參考自訂控制，請使用`Register`指示詞的組件，而``控制項項目。The page references the custom control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `` element for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/CS/propertyGridEditorPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/VB/propertyGridEditorPartVB.aspx#1)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是自訂名為類別`UserInfoWebPart`，參考網頁中。The third part of the code example is a custom class named `UserInfoWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page. 請注意，包含使用者資訊的各種屬性都標記為`WebBrowsable`屬性。Notice that the various properties that contain information about a user are all marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute. 這可讓提供編輯這些屬性的 UI 控制項。This enables the control to provide the UI for editing those properties. 屬性也會標示`WebDisplayName`屬性，以指定的編輯 UI 中的每個控制項旁出現的標籤文字。The properties are also marked with a `WebDisplayName` attribute, to specify the text of the label that appears next to each control in the editing UI. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#5)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，選取**編輯模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）**使用者資訊 WebPart**控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**，編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **User Information WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 顯示編輯的 UI 時，您可以看到控制項。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control. 請注意，針對每個屬性的轉譯控制項`UserInfoWebPart`類別，根據屬性的類型。Notice that a control is rendered for each of the properties of the `UserInfoWebPart` class, based on the type of the property. 如果您進行一些變更中編輯 UI 按一下**套用** 按鈕，您可以使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式，並查看完整的編輯變更影響的下拉式清單。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

MemberSignature.Value: public PropertyGridEditorPart ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: PropertyGridEditorPart();

summary.span: 建立類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式是預設值，則沒有建構函式宣告中類別，因此沒有特殊的工作會執行建立類別的新執行個體時。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool ApplyChanges ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool ApplyChanges() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ApplyChanges () As Boolean
public: override bool ApplyChanges();
override this.ApplyChanges : unit -> bool

summary.span: 將值從 控制項儲存至相關聯 控制項中相應的屬性。

span.span: Saves the values from a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果將值從 儲存至 的動作順利進行，則為 ，否則 (如果發生錯誤) 為 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the to the is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是關鍵的方法上控制項。The method is a critical method on a control. 方法會將儲存的使用者已設定的值中相關聯的對應屬性的控制項控制項。The method saves the values a user has set on a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control. 在參考相關聯的控制項控制項的繼承屬性。The associated control is referenced in the control's inherited property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您無法覆寫方法因為型別密封格式，以防止繼承自它。You cannot override the method because the type is sealed to prevent inheriting from it. 不過，如果您需要編輯不同的程序需以程式設計方式控制控制屬性比提供控制項，您可以建立自訂控制，並提供這個方法的實作。However, if you need more programmatic control over the process of editing various control properties than the control provides, you can create a custom control and provide your own implementation of this method. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱方法。For a code example, see the method. 方法會嘗試在公用中相關聯的自訂屬性上設定的值控制，前提是這些屬性每個都有`[WebBrowsable(true)]`屬性。The method attempts to set the values on public custom properties in the associated control, provided that those properties each have a `[WebBrowsable(true)]` attribute. 方法在使用者按一下按鈕，表示確定或編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 中套用動詞命令時呼叫。The method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI). 您也可以呼叫它直接從您自己的程式碼是否需要儲存的編輯的值除了使用者動作。You can also call it directly from your own code if there is a need to save the edited values apart from user actions.

exception.span: 嘗試為相關聯 上的屬性設定值時發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred when trying to set the value for a property on the associated .

public override string DefaultButton { get; set; }
.property instance string DefaultButton
Public Overrides Property DefaultButton As String

member this.DefaultButton : string with get, set

summary.span: 覆寫繼承自 控制項的基底屬性，並從設計工具隱藏該屬性，防止它受主題的影響。

span.span: Overrides the base property inherited from the control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.

value.span: 字串，包含收到 控制項中預設焦點之 控制項的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control that receives the default focus in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然它是公用的，但這個屬性僅用於此控制項的預設呈現，而不可以從開發人員程式碼進行呼叫。Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Display { get; }
.property instance bool Display
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };
member this.Display : bool

summary.span: 取得值，指出當與控制項相關聯的 控制項處於編輯模式時，是否應該顯示該控制項。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated control is in edit mode.

value.span: 布林值，指出是否應該顯示控制項。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`false`如果基底屬性的值也是`false`。The property returns `false` if the value on the base property is also `false`. 否則，如果要編輯的控制項不是`null`，然後在顯示控制項。Otherwise, if the control to be edited is not `null`, then the control is displayed. 屬性適用於僅當頁面處於編輯模式和已選取要編輯的控制項。The property applies only when a page is in edit mode, and a control has been selected for editing.

summary.span: 從 控制項擷取值，並更新用於編輯 控制項中那些屬性值的相應控制項。

span.span: Retrieves the values from a control, and updates the corresponding controls used to edit those property values within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是關鍵的方法上控制項。The method is a critical method on a control. 它會實作基底類別的方法會擷取目前的值從相關聯控制項，然後更新中的控制項具有這些值，讓使用者編輯控制項。It implements the method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated control, and updates the controls in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 方法呼叫時中相關聯的值控制項可能已變更。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 如控制項，區域，其中包含控制呼叫方法後立即呼叫方法，使中的值控制項一律會同步處理中的值相關聯控制項。For a control, the zone that contains the control calls the method immediately after calling the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control. 另一種情況其中方法呼叫時控制項進入編輯模式。Another case where the method is called is when a control is entering edit mode.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定編輯器控制項的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

value.span: 做為控制項標題的字串。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 預設值是 Web 組件控制項集合所提供的計算控制項名稱。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值會顯示在標題列控制控制項時顯示在編輯模式。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in edit mode. 控制項在頁面中宣告時，您可以設定的值`Title`屬性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute. 如果您未提供標題的值，提供特定文化特性的預設值。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is supplied. 屬性覆寫基底屬性，因此，如果沒有提供任何標題值，預設值標題適合控制項可以提供的 Web 組件控制項集合。The property overrides the base property so that, if no title value is supplied, a default title appropriate to a control can be supplied by the Web Parts control set. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性控制項。This code example demonstrates how to use the property of a control. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下列程式碼範例示範如何在設定標題以宣告方式在網頁中的控制項。The following code example shows how to set the title on a control declaratively in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/CS/propertyGridEditorPartCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/VB/propertyGridEditorPartVB.aspx#2)] 下一個部分的程式碼範例示範如何設定的值屬性以程式設計的方式。The next part of the code example shows how to set the value of the property programmatically. 以保存以程式設計的方式指派的值，靜態變數命名為`editControlTitle`使用時，這個值會指派給和屬性初始化的控制項，如此回傳事件之間的值會保存每次。In order to persist the programmatically assigned value, a static variable named `editControlTitle` is used, and this value is assigned to the property each time the control is initialized, so that the value is persisted between postback events. [!code-csharp[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/CS/propertyGridEditorPartCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/VB/propertyGridEditorPartVB.aspx#3)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）**使用者資訊 WebPart**控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**開始編輯。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **User Information WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到控制項，以及位於其上方的按鈕和文字方塊的方塊。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 請注意，標題控制項是在網頁上的宣告式標記指派給它的值。Note that the title of the control is the value assigned to it in the declarative markup of the Web page. 如果您輸入一些文字在文字方塊旁邊**更新 EditorPart 標題**按鈕，然後再按一下按鈕標題的控制項也會更新。If you enter some text in the text box next to the **Update EditorPart Title** button, and then click the button, the title for the control is updated.
